title: The Best Trick
description: My guys and I are stunned when our worst enemy, Agent Denko, comes to us for help.Agent Denko, the man whose fondest wish is to destroy us in the most disturbing way possible, needs our help.Wuuuuuut?Are pigs flying? Has hell frozen over? Has Odin’s way of removing his glasses stopped being sexy?Never!At first, we’re sure it’s a trick. My guys’ protective instincts are on full alert as they turn their sights on the man who’s had us in his sights for too long.It’s foolish to trust Agent Denko…right? But what if he really needs our help?How can we push him away when he holds the key everything we’ve always wanted?
author: Annika Martin
